about_the_game:
Skate your ride! Pull off epic tricks, stack insane combos, and smash those high scores. Jump into multiplayer and flex your skills in tons of Party game modes.

Stunts and tricks

Perform aerial flips, barrel rolls, loops, grinds and drifting in this love letter to Tony Hawk Pro Skater, Rush and Gymkhana. Combine tricks, increase your multiplier and shatter the online leaderboards. The smooth and intuitive physics of REKT Party makes it easy to learn but hard to master!


Multiplayer

Play a session with up to 8 friends or join a public lobby. Create a lobby with your own rules or start a party and select one of the curated playlists of gamemodes.


Challenges

Each arena provides unique Challenges, from tackling a highscore, performing a specific trick, to collecting all REKT letters and many more. Keep building your xp levels in singleplayer or online and unlock new arenas, cars and customizations!

Cars with unique physics

Unlock tons of unique cars and customize them with an array of spoilers, wheel rims, horns, and stickers. Each car boasts its own physics, ensuring a fresh and exciting experience every time you get behind the wheel. Whether you're racing, jumping, flipping, or grinding, REKT Party has something for everyone. And there’s always more cars being added to the game!

Gamemodes

REKT Party provides a load of gamemodes which can be played either alone or with friends.

In Single Player mode, you can show off your skills and snag the top spot on the online leaderboard.

Play these game modes with your friends in Multiplayer:

  • Baja
    Race from point to point, score by finishing first!

  • Capture the Crown
    Hold on to the crown for one minute to win!

  • Checkpoints
    Race through all the checkpoints and be fastest!

  • Virus
    A game of tag! Infect everyone or stay uninfected!

  • Parkour
    A puzzle platformer parkour, get the furthest to win!

  • Egghunt
    Collect and steal eggs! Bring to the chicken to score!

  • Hunt 'n Stunt
    Stunters set a score while hunters wreck them.

  • Rock Paper Scissors
    Players gets rock, paper or scissors. Try to hit others!

  • Cops and Robbers
    The robber must escape the cops for as long as possible!

Roadmap


REKT Party is currently in development, and depending on the available resources we will go to the next phase.

Phase 1 (we are here)
Demo with single car, single arena and multiple game modes.

Phase 2
Extend demo to include more cars, customization, single player challenges, online multiplayer improvements.

Phase 3
Possibly Early Access version with more cars, arena's, challenges.

Phase 4
Full release.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1 or Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 @2.3 GHz or AMD Dual-Core Athlon 2.4 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 730 or AMD Radeon HD 7850
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: REKT Party is an arcade stunt racing game where cars become skateboards. Flip, grind and drift through arenas filled with massive ramps, half-pipes and wall-rides! Chase highscores in singleplayer or online co-op or join the party in tons of multiplayer game modes.
